name: pierceflow/booking-system
description: Professional Piercing Studio Booking System with WhatsApp Notifications

post-install-cmd: php -r "if(file_exists('includes/railway_database.php')) { require_once 'includes/railway_database.php'; try { RailwayDatabase::getConnection(); echo 'Database connection: OK' . PHP_EOL; } catch(Exception \$e) { echo 'Database connection: FAILED - ' . \$e->getMessage() . PHP_EOL; } } else { echo 'Railway database configuration not found' . PHP_EOL; }"
railway-deploy: php -r "require_once 'includes/railway_database.php'; RailwayDatabase::setupTables(); RailwayDatabase::seedDefaultData(); echo 'Database setup completed for Railway deployment' . PHP_EOL;"
